alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued November 09 at 3:28AM AKST until November 10 at 7:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Snow accumulations of up to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. Blowing snow creating whiteout visibility at times. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 7 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
